mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mishu_write.`tb_vip_profits` ( v_profits_id, settings_code, increase_days, v_id, his_expired_date, created ) VALUES (#{vProfitsId},'a-operate',#{vipDay},#{vId},#{expiredDate},NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT t.created, t.settings_code AS settingsCode, t.increase_days AS vipDay, t.his_expired_date AS expiredDate FROM mishu_write.`tb_vip_profits` t JOIN mishu_write.`tb_vip_info` t1 ON t.v_id=t1.v_id WHERE t.v_id = #{vId} and t.settings_code <> 'a-inviter'

SELECT t4.`phone_no` as behavior, t3.his_expired_date AS expiredDate, t3.created, t3.increase_days AS vipDay FROM mishu_write.`sys_user_info` t JOIN mishu_write.`tb_vip_info` t2 ON t.pkid = t2.`user_id` JOIN mishu_write.`tb_vip_profits` t3 ON t2.`v_id` = t3.`v_id` JOIN mishu_write.`sys_user_info` t4 ON t3.`inviter_code`=t4.`inviter_code` WHERE t.`own_invite_code` = #{ownInviteCode} AND t3.settings_code = 'a-inviter' GROUP BY t4.`phone_no`
